info.name: Items API
info.description: Sanity testing for the CHS Ordering Items API.

item.name: Missing attributes
Create certificate item missing company number

body.raw:
{
    "item_options": {
        "additional_information": "Certificate required by HMRC.",
        "cert_acc": false,
        "cert_arts": false,
        "cert_cobj": false,
        "cert_dir": false,
        "cert_dissliq": false,
        "cert_domicil": false,
        "cert_extra_i": false,
        "cert_inc": true,
        "cert_inc_con_last": false,
        "cert_isscap": false,
        "cert_mem": false,
        "cert_mortdoc": false,
        "cert_nomc": false,
        "cert_nonexis": false,
        "cert_only": false,
        "cert_other_c": false,
        "cert_ret": false,
        "cert_roc": false,
        "cert_sec": false,
        "cert_shar": true
    },
	"quantity": 3
}
